title: Chat Restricted 10 games. Rank how toxic I am.
body:

If anybody wants to play this joke of a game seriously, disable the chat entirely.

replies.body: You know that you are punished for consistent x severity? Your toxicity severity can be 1/100, but if you did that for 100 games will still get you punished.

Spamming "toxic" and "report" is often punishable. Hell, you didn't even have to say anything and just muted them. They most likely know they are toxic and will eventually get reported anyway.

Seriously It's like you're robbing a bank and having hostages.
"You're a hostage and I'm robbing this bank!"
"You're a hostage and I'm robbing this bank!"
"You're a hostage and I'm robbing this bank!"

Okay, point is, just say "You're reported for being toxic" literally just once and mute them. The mute button isn't there for decorations.
K so disable the chat.

> [{quoted}](name=NWA Titi Boi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AExjvpju,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-06-09T22:30:27.516+0000)
>
> K so disable the chat.

Eh....only if the ally is being useless.
Rather than saying valuable shit like "We can baron after this" or "I will start drake soon" which obviously you shouldn't mute, instead you just see "noob", "feeding" etc. Then that's when hit the mute button. It's like bitch slapping a duct tape on someone's mouth without even knowing it.

decently toxic 

dont type so much. stop saying "ok your reported" "dude your toxic"

if someone just wont shut up, i usually just say "toxic" and leave it at that. i use emotes usually to communicate with these crazed people.

1st offense, slap on the wrist, learn from it

toxicity doesn't have to be just straight up cursing or flaming. it can just be making fights happen and just adding fuel to the fire, leading to a toxic game.
So you're telling me to silence myself? Whats the point of the chat then? I feel personally attacked by your comment.

Anything that is an insult/harassment towards others. 

There are other things that are punishable if you did itboftenly enough such as having a negative attitude and demoralizing the team; or consistently arguing back and forth and creating a distraction.

the point of the chat is to communicate with your team. i dont play the game with all chat. in fact, all chat is completely pointless and I personally would remove it from the game entirely as it all it does is support toxicity. it used to be an ok thnig back in the day, but everyone is having a D measuring contest now a days.

dont talk with your teammates back and fourth, it will just make them play worse and flame. only communicate info with pings, emotes, and simple phrases. for instance, i only type probably 1-10 words a game.
So now I cant talk to my teammates? What has this game come to? Im so triggered by this comment.

> [{quoted}](name=NWA Titi Boi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AExjvpju,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-09T22:18:21.824+0000)
>

you can, just dont continue fighting them. that is flaming" saying it once is probably ok, but you literally typed a wall of text. that is "flaming" you dont stop.

There's no scale on toxicity. There's either being toxic or not being toxic. 

No in between. 
It's the fact they're toxic in general is not allowed. 
So there will be no scaling here. Just don't do it. Period.

There is a scale. It's literally built in to the system. You can either get escalating punishments starting at 10-game chat restriction, instant escalation to 14-day ban or in rare cases instant escalation to permanent ban.
Dont do what? Wtf are you on about?

It's not rocket science. 
Just don't be toxic. Or find a new game.

If not, then get punished, lose all products, lose all progress, make a new account, rinse and repeat. 
That will be your only future in this game if you do not change your attitude. Nothing will change, only you can. Those are your only two choices.  

No matter what you choose, you will do what Riot and the community expects.
Yeah, Ill go ahead and quit the game because this is dumb as hell.

Good.
You'll be doing Riot and Community a favor.
Having played this game for 9 years, this game is dying. The only thing punishment like this accomplishes is push players further away. And good riddance.

You're not going to say anything no one hasn't heard yet. 
You're not the first to say that this game is dying. You won't be the last in the next 10 years. 

The IFS is working as intended.

IFS is not working as intended.
